a simplifi recombin scheme for the fibonacci buddi system asimplifi recombin scheme for the fibonacci buddi system which requirneither tabl nor repetit calcul and us onli two additbit per buffer is present cacm june 1975 cranston bthoma r fibonacci buddi system dynam storag alloc buddi system3 89 4 32 4 39 ca750606 jb januari 91978 1 07 pm 2596 4 2747 2747 4 27472768 4 2747 2845 4 2747 2902 4 2747 29114 2747 2955 4 2747 2435 5 2747 2747 52747 2747 5 2747 2747 5 2747 2773 5 27472845 5 2747 2902 5 2747 2955 5 2747 10516 2747 1062 6 2747 1184 6 2747 1184 62747 1184 6 2747 1211 6 2747 1552 6 27471879 6 2747 2435 6 2747 2435 6 2747 24356 2747 2596 6 2747 2596 6 2747 2598 62747 2734 6 2747 2736 6 2747 2747 6 27472747 6 2747 2747 6 2747 2747 6 2747 27686 2747 2768 6 2747 2773 6 2747
